basic.description:
A theoretical and practical introduction to theatrical production including stage management; various elements of scenery design and construction; costume and properties; lighting and sound systems and equipment. Seventy-two additional laboratory hours required on department productions.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (18S;18Pc;84P)
basic.subject: DRAM
basic.title: Introduction To Theatre Space

extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisite    A grade of B- in 6.0 units from (DRAM100; DRAM181; BISC100; BISC101) or permission of the Department.
Corequisite    DRAM200.
Exclusion     No more than 6.0 units from DRAM240; DRAM242; DRAM245
